title: NEED HELP WITH A BAN
body: My account was banned permanently today for "botting". I am the owner of this account and have always owned and had possession of this account. Can someone please help me? I have spent quite a bit of money on this account on skins and runes/emotes and I dont want to start over for something I dont even know how to do. I have submitted a ticket as well

replies.body:
Took a look at OP's match history from their response in another thread. Copying my response here as well;

Looking at your [match history](https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/2212277560609088)

The start of your account's history is similar to the other person's history. Nothing but ghost heal and playing extremely poorly.

Your account name was even "AugustinexHxSpF" during this period of ghost heal.

9/2/2019 was the last game you played your massive string of TT games. Then you take a long break till 10/26/2019 and suddenly you're playing Ranked. Oh yeah, and you changed your name to "11thAccountHaha" for this game.

Yeah, I think your account was botted as well.
I played TT for the icons so that proves absolutely nothing. Also I dont think name changes are against Riots policy.

> [{quoted}](name=IStunCardI,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TjTgTBJH,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2020-01-10T01:18:18.888+0000)
>
> I played TT for the icons so that proves absolutely nothing. Also I dont think name changes are against Riots policy.

All of the pieces add up to an extremely suspicious account. 

Playing non-stop with ghost/heal, a seemingly random gap of time, then as soon as you pick up the account again it's suddenly playing ranked. Those TT days the account was playing an inhuman amount of games. On 9/1/19 over 30 games were played. 

Having a very bot-like name then changing it when the gap has ended (and changing it to something that taunts the number of accounts you have was just a cherry on top IMO).

And so on.

Frankly, I don't believe you in the slightest with all of those adding up.

I dont care if you believe me or not. Ill not be leveling another account nor playing this game anymore after this. This is completely ridiculous. Purchasing XP boosts, skins, emotes and runes and spending hours and hours leveling the account just to be shit on.

Its called power leveling, An average game of TT is 8 mins long, you're not going to be playing 20-30 mins of TT like you do on Summoner's Rift. 30 games of TT with an average of 8 mins a game is 4 hours of playtime, not unreasonable. That's the reason why they removed TT.

The botlike name is suspicious tho.

> [{quoted}](name=SplitPush4Life,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TjTgTBJH,comment-id=0004000000000001,timestamp=2020-01-10T01:36:02.309+0000)
>
> Its called power leveling, An average game of TT is 8 mins long, you're not going to be playing 20-30 mins of TT like you do on Summoner's Rift. 30 games of TT with an average of 8 mins a game is 4 hours of playtime, not unreasonable. That's the reason why they removed TT.
> 
> The botlike name is suspicious tho.

They removed TT because they felt there was very little use of it besides from bots. If someone were earnestly powerleveling you wouldn't see them suddenly stop once they got to the point where they wanted their account.

Your account is in the same boat.
the real MVP{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Looking briefly over your match history (as some nobody). It looks incredibly normal. I don't see tons of games in an unreasonable amount of time. I don't see ridiculous scores one way or another. Maybe someone can take another look at this?

/Edit: holy botting, Batman. I didn't go back far enough when I looked.
~~Yep, I don't see anything specifically pointing towards scripts/botting~~. But, those things are detected by their interaction with active game memory, so outwardly visible signs aren't needed.

I do see many instances of selling all his items at minute 7 in a 24 minute game. So, he should be banned for trolling.

I haven't had a ton of time on the boards but this isn't the first time I've seen this in the past couple days - are people who deserve trolling bans maybe getting banned under "third party programs" or "botting" instead by accident?
I highly doubt that was the case.
You couldnt be more wrong. If you look at my match history you will see no trolling or griefing games. Nice effort tho!
I concur 100% with Silent Gravity - there are multiple games that are 100% clear griefing in your match history.
Well, the match history I looked at didn't go back far enough. Aerowaffle has the tea, if you check his reply.

Ah. So correct botting ban, but they also deserved one for inting as well. I wonder if Riot is investigating intentional feeding and placing botting bans when that's clear too? Who knows. Regardless, appropriate punishment.
Scroll up.
Who are you replying to phreak?
I asked and am awaiting a reply. Probably wont get one since its communist riot.
Anger helps productivity, but only if you control it. Be polite.
Hard to be polite when ive poured so much time and money into this account just for this to happen to me

Controlling yourself is not hard. You're *letting* it control you. Nobody is ever entitled to act out of control. I understand you're angry. I've been T-boned at a stop sign intersection, it disrupted my life heavily, it hurt, and the lady who did it was acting like she had nothing to do with it.

Had I staring cussing a storm at the lady, my behavior would have at best been tolerated, but it still would be wrong. (That was not how I reacted.)
I havent dont anything with my frustration. Ive held myself under control. It is hard to be polite when you get treated this way though.
I empathize with your frustration. Hopefully it was just a false positive and things go back to normal for you.
what's the point of posting this? very childish.

dude you're missing the point

I dont care if what he's saying crosses the line 

my point is, just report the comments you think are offensive and move on. making a post bragging about it is the exact reason asking for reports is punishable in-game
in case you know that your acc isnt bought or ever shared, id say write a ticket to riot support.
Most likely, your account was hacked and someone else played on it with scripts. Do you see any matches in your match history that you don't remember playing?

Nope. Nobody else has played on this account. Just me. Riot Support emailed me back saying they detected third party software and there is nothing they can do. I am so fucking mad right now. I have spent so much time and money on this account.

> [{quoted}](name=IStunCardI,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TjTgTBJH,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2020-01-09T22:09:34.583+0000)
>
> Nope. Nobody else has played on this account. Just me. Riot Support emailed me back saying they detected third party software and there is nothing they can do. I am so fucking mad right now. I have spent so much time and money on this account.

Their first reply was probably canned, and simply says to people who think third party software is okay that it isn't. You'll need to follow up on that response and say that you didn't use third party software and could a human check it out. Also ask if they detected any suspicious activity like a login from another country, just in case.
Just to let you know, they're incredibly obviously botted. Aerowaffle looked back far enough in match history.

> [{quoted}](name=Silent Gravity,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TjTgTBJH,comment-id=0000000000000001,timestamp=2020-01-10T01:43:12.652+0000)
>
> Just to let you know, they're incredibly obviously botted. Aerowaffle looked back far enough in match history.

Ah. So when OP said "Nobody else has played on this account" they were... well, lying through their teeth. That's cool. Anyway, good to see one of those blasted leveling scripts get the smackdown. Pretty sad that they were foolish enough to buy content for it.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TjTgTBJH,comment-id=00000000000000010000,timestamp=2020-01-10T03:12:41.725+0000)
>
> Ah. So when OP said "Nobody else has played on this account" they were... well, lying through their teeth. That's cool. Anyway, good to see one of those blasted leveling scripts get the smackdown. Pretty sad that they were foolish enough to buy content for it.

I will say, I never understood the allure of leveling an account in LoL. It isn't an MMO, where there is a tangible benefit to botting. Sure, if you are doing it *for* performance reasons, then that at least makes some sense, but at some point one of two things is going to happen

1. You would get high enough where you would be found out (I bet they check Master and higher most frequently)
2. You get so high that not even scripting can help you, and you lose *despite* having scripts.

> [{quoted}](name=Modi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TjTgTBJH,comment-id=000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2020-01-10T03:46:43.144+0000)
>
> I will say, I never understood the allure of leveling an account in LoL. It isn't an MMO, where there is a tangible benefit to botting. Sure, if you are doing it *for* performance reasons, then that at least makes some sense, but at some point one of two things is going to happen
> 
> 1. You would get high enough where you would be found out (I bet they check Master and higher most frequently)
> 2. You get so high that not even scripting can help you, and you lose *despite* having scripts.

Leveling scripts allow an account to hit 30 with a bunch of BE without requiring human effort. They are then sold to people who got permabanned but want to continue to ruin ranked games and aren't willing to level an account to 30 with non-ranked matches themselves. As you see, such accounts are basically disposable. Most people wouldn't be so stupid as to get attached to a botted account and buy skins for it.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TjTgTBJH,comment-id=0000000000000001000000000001,timestamp=2020-01-10T04:10:01.008+0000)
>
> Leveling scripts allow an account to hit 30 with a bunch of BE without requiring human effort. They are then sold to people who got permabanned but want to continue to ruin ranked games and aren't willing to level an account to 30 with non-ranked matches themselves. As you see, such accounts are basically disposable. Most people wouldn't be so stupid as to get attached to a botted account and buy skins for it.

I know the purpose, I meant the allure. There is no point other than to be destructive.

> [{quoted}](name=Modi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TjTgTBJH,comment-id=00000000000000010000000000010000,timestamp=2020-01-10T04:35:29.009+0000)
>
> I know the purpose, I meant the allure. There is no point other than to be destructive.

I mean, those people want to play ranked. Right now. They don't care about the damage they cause when they buy botted accounts.

Your reply is confusing.  First you talk about leveling an account, which is a bot playing the entire game.  Then your 2 points talk about scripting, which is a human player using scripts or macros to enhance performance and automate some functions.  Leveling up an account using a bot is not the same thing as climbing elo with the aid of a script/macro.

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=TjTgTBJH,comment-id=0000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2020-01-10T03:57:53.376+0000)
>
> Your reply is confusing.  First you talk about leveling an account, which is a bot playing the entire game.  Then your 2 points talk about scripting, which is a human player using scripts or macros to enhance performance and automate some functions.  Leveling up an account using a bot is not the same thing as climbing elo with the aid of a script/macro.

Yes, I am talking about the two collectively. I come from FPS & MMO background in my gaming history. In those, there is no distinction between entirely computer controlled vs partially computer controlled or computer assisted. All are botting. Yes, the two have different end goals in LoL, but they are not incredibly different, save for the fact that bots are usually quite low effort, with respect to the engineering effort put into creating them.

Some may differentiate the two, I don't. They are one in the same, from my perspective.

^
Let us know the result.
I am in the same boat as you right now, Just got banned for botting like an hour ago, and they don't even care.
